description.value:
Special: Daemonbane, Force, Power Field, Unwieldy

Note: Two-Handed unless wielder has Strength Bonus of 5+ Once per Session as a Full Action, wielder can smite the ground, creating a 2d10 metre radius blast, all other characters must make -20 Agility Test or lose a Half Action on their next turn. Those that fail by 2+ DoF lose their Full Action.
